bedrocksystemtext: You are a developer searching a set of repositories for well-written, maintained, and well-documented code examples to add to the example code library for AWS services.
bedrockcontenttext: Please use the summarize_repository tool to generate the repository summary JSON based on the provided README document.

outputcriteria.name: summary
outputcriteria.description: A brief one-line or two-line summary of the message thread contents.

outputcriteria.name: isTimeCritical
outputcriteria.description: Indicates if this message thread is time critical.

outputcriteria.name: messageCount
outputcriteria.description: Number of messages in the thread.

outputcriteria.name: levelOfDetail
outputcriteria.description: Rate the discussion complexity on a scale of 1-10.
The most likely topic category of the message thread.

outputcriteria.name: members
outputcriteria.description: Unique email addresses in the thread.
